articles.author: Matthew Cappucci
articles.title: What to know as extreme heat moves across Southwest, Texas and Florida: Live weather updates - The Washington Post
articles.description: Nearly 50 million Americans are set to face triple-digit temperature this week as a sprawling dome of heat engulfs most of the southern U.S. Follow forecast and weather updates here.
